message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the issue of password leaks and proposes a solution to mitigate the effects of such breaches at the user level. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper introduces a Firefox add-on, which involves user interaction and usability, making cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) another likely category. The paper also discusses the storage of passwords in the Firefox password manager, which falls under cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The paper also touches upon the issue of password reuse, which is related to cs.CY (Computers and Society). Finally, the paper proposes an algorithm for resetting passwords, which falls under cs.SE (Software Engineering).
